code: import{css as _css}from"styled-components";var fonts=_css(["@font-face{font-family:'Metal Lord';src:url('../fonts/Metal Lord V1.woff2') format('woff2'),url('../fonts/Metal Lord V1.woff') format('woff');font-weight:400;font-style:normal;}@font-face{font-family:'Metal Lord';src:url('../fonts/Metal Lord V1.woff2') format('woff2'),url('../fonts/Metal Lord V1.woff') format('woff');font-weight:700;font-style:normal;}@font-face{font-family:'Metal Lord';src:url('../fonts/Metal Lord V1.woff2') format('woff2'),url('../fonts/Metal Lord V1.woff') format('woff');font-weight:900;font-style:normal;}"]);export default fonts;
